## Bio

Patrick studies non-native fishes in the Chehalis River Basin, WA and how to leverage fish suppression as a tool to recover Pacific salmon. He primarily uses molecular tools to measure changes in distribution, diet, and abundance. Beyond his scientific interests, he enjoys rock climbing, skiing, swimming, and cycling. Above all, Patrick seeks to have a good time with friends and family.
